      • LotteryCheckArguments

        public void LotteryCheckArguments(java.lang.String[] args)
        Exception handling and setting properties of Lottery model
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments. Firts argument should be number of numbers you want to bet. Second argument is last number program can pick (from 1 to this number). Next x arguments(x = first argument) should be numbers you want to bet.
